person.persName: John H. Mellen (Jefferson County, Indiana, merchant and serg. 1st Ky Light Artillery)

body.p: Jefferson County, Indiana, merchant and soldier. Massachusetts native. Son of John Mellen and Eliza Mellen. Married to Ann Maria Stone Mellen in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on May 27, 1852. Married to Margaret "Maggie" B. Crowe Mellen in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 17, 1865. Merchant in Jefferson County, Indiana, in 1850. Merchant in Jefferson County, Indiana, in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery (U.S.A.) as sergeant and lieutenant from September 9, 1861, to October 22, 1864.
